item.title: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore calls special session to elect new House speaker
item.description: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore has called for a special session next week to pick a replacement for outgoing House Speaker Adrienne Jones.

item.title: Trump's economic reset collides with ballot box results as Democrats celebrate more wins
item.description: President Trump and Republicans woke up Wednesday licking their wounds after another bruising night at the ballot box.

item.title: Judge orders Trump to stop using California's National Guard
item.description: A federal judge accused President Trump on Wednesday of using National Guard troops to create a "national police force" and ordered him to relinquish ...

item.title: Trump slams media over coverage that he is 'slowing down'
item.description: President Trump reprimanded the press for reporting that he is losing his stamina.

item.title: Democrat wins Miami mayor's race for the first time in nearly 30 years
item.description: Democrat Eileen Higgins won the Miami mayor's race on Tuesday, defeating a Republican endorsed by President Donald Trump to end her party's nearly thr...
